properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique ID for this event

properties.name: start
properties.description: The unix-second timestamp UTC when the event will begin

properties.name: end
properties.description: The unix-second UTC timestamp when the event finishes

properties.name: venues
properties.description: The venues in which this event takes place

properties.name: attendance
properties.description: The anticipated attendance of this event

properties.name: ents
properties.description: The ent state of this event

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state of this event approval

properties.name: author
properties.description: The user who is running this event

properties.name: reserved
properties.description: If this space and time has been reserved for this event
